info.label: HFT | Trading Systems | Low Latency Execution | Real-Time Distributed Systems | Decentralized Ledgers | Blockchain | Cryptocurrency
info.brief: Senior Engineer, specializing in developing highly performant, low-latency trading systems. Experienced in building fast, scalable & reliable applications for financial markets.

highlights: Designed and implemented highly available, low latency, and scalable services in C++ that ran in parallel to legacy systems before ultimately replacing them.
Implemented services to support the processing of orders and trades within the match engine
Implemented services that use Kafka to publish events from the match engine and ledger services
Implemented services to store and read data from AWS S3
Implemented gRPC endpoints that conformed to legacy APIs, but sourced from entirely new data formats•

history.summary: Memeber of the team responsible for the development, deployment & maintenence of Low-Latency Execution Engine for the firms Canadian & Brazilian business.
highlights: Developed a Beneficiary Ownership Check hop to restirict 'wash trades' which inturn prevented the firm from incurring fines due to cross-trades (if any).
Developed a smart order router for Bovespa (Brazil), BIVA/BMV (Mexico), and TSX (Canada) with a median roundtrip latency of approximately 27 microseconds.
Created system tests for verifying smart-order router functionality, log replay scripts, and end-of-day log analyzer scripts.
